title: Beast
description: The first full-length solo work of Marian Churchland, artist of Conan: Trophy. Colette, a young sculptor looking for work, finds a job with a mysterious client who wants her to carve his portrait out of marble. The client turns out to be a shadowy creature, and the block of marble, she discovers, has a long history that threatens to engulf her entirely
author: Marian Churchland
